reviews.text: The cafe is at a convenience place as we finished our Cavern Adventure Experience.  It is a relaxing cafe, clean and comfortable.  The serving stuff were friendly with a pretty smiling face on her face.  I ordered a club sandwich. It was tasty but personally I like my bread toasted. It will be more crunchy if so.

Not sure why the high reviews. The juice are cardbox quality with ice (you can see it from the the menu, a Coke is healthier than a juice). 10min to serve it.

All food is heated from frozen packages. Tables and floor ain't kept very clean,
The only serving grace is there is air-conditioning.

Excellent place to stop and have a drink or something to eat. The staff are friendly and helpful. The view from the window is Tapir. A little lonely though. The place is clean and tidy. Highly recommended!

This is a relatively small and cosy place, with warm and attentive service. My family and I were glad to stop there towards the end of our visit to grab a bite and enjoy the aircon.
Foodwise, the quality was also very good. We ordered buffalo wings, and shared the club sandwich, panini sandwich and lasagna. All these were tasty and the portion sizes were just right for my family.

We also found out that Mandai Park has just debuted Owa Coffee, which is produced as part of a Coffee & Primate conservation project supported by Wildlife Reserves Singapore in Java, Indonesia. We were glad to sample the long black. It was rich and smooth. Highly recommended.

One more comment, Iâ€™d like to suggest that the menu selection could be improved by offering a greater variety of items to cater to the diverse visitors to the Mandai Attraction.

Overall, a very nice spot to chill. We even saw the tapir whose enclosure is located right next to the cafe ðŸ˜„.

Raymond and his team immaculate service.
Excellent Service and Friendly Staff at Watering Hole Cafe.
MUST TRY MINT MOCHA!

I had a wonderful experience at Watering Hole Cafe. The service is exceptional, with the waiters being attentive, friendly, and always ready to assist. They made sure everything was perfect without being intrusive. The staffâ€™s warm hospitality created a welcoming atmosphere, making the whole dining experience even more enjoyable. The service was prompt, and they handled special requests with ease. I would highly recommend Watering Hole Cafe to anyone looking for great food and top-notch service. Canâ€™t wait to visit again!
